definitions.definition: Made or done in a way adjusted to fit the needs of a particular person or group (e.g., customer , health care patient , do-it-yourselfer ), and thus specialized and, in some cases, unique .
examples: My feet are very large, so I need custom shoes, specially made by a custom tailor.

definitions.definition: Own, personal, not standard or premade.
examples: We can embroider a wide range of ready designs or a custom logo.

definitions.definition: Done on a for- hire basis, as contrasted with being done only for oneself.
examples: The amount of high-end equipment that he maintains is justified by the fact that he does a lot of custom tillage and combining.
My grandfather did his own threshing, plus a bunch of custom threshing on the side.

main_definition: Made or done in a way adjusted to fit the needs of a particular person or group (e.g., customer , health care patient , do-it-yourselfer ), and thus specialized and, in some cases, unique .
secondary_definitions: Own, personal, not standard or premade.
( especially agriculture ) Done on a for- hire basis, as contrasted with being done only for oneself.
